_sText:
This Map is an underwater facility Based Map with a single trigger

The code for the reactor is 1542 if u destroy it most of the lighting inside of the facility become inactive along with all the doors

the backup reactor can only be enabled after the main reactor has been destroyed

There are many Hiding places and and barricading spots

The map is fairly large

Also after the main reactor has been destroyed the Door which never seems to open (the 1 with the radiation warning signs around it will unlock)

if you go through it will take you to a room with a large Vortex this entire room is a low gravity area

Should you press the button in this area the vortex will try and pull you in however if you go through the middle of the vortex you will be safely teleported out however if you hit the lasers or the edge of the vortex death is very likely even for a zombie there is 3 ways out of the building into the sea 1 water tight door 1 through the vent up the top near the broken elevator

and the final along the long passageway either way there are many ways out

Enjoy

PS. Should you wish to do a remake of this map i will gladly send you the VMF file please contact me and let me know if you are interested

CREDITS:

doors taken from ze_spacestationflee and retextured so credits go to appropiate author of those doors
